FORGOT.TITLE: Forgotten Password?
FORGOT.DESC: Enter your Email to reset your password

LOGIN.ERROR: Your login credentials are incorrect, please try again!
LOGIN.ERRORCHANGE: Sorry, it looks like errors were found, please try again.

REACTIVE.INPUT: Enter your Email address to verify your account

VALIDATORS.INVALID_EMAIL_MESSAGE: Email address must be a valid address
VALIDATORS.PASSWORD_VAL: Password must be between eight and sixty-eight characters

LASTNAME.HELPER: Last Name must be between 2-10 characters long

REGISTER.TITLE: Sign Up
REGISTER.DESC: Enter your details to create your account
REGISTER.SUCCESS: Your account has been successfuly registered.

RESET.TITLE: Reset your password
RESET.SUCCESS: Your password has been successfully changed.

OTP_SCREEN.VERIFICATION_CODE_SENT: A 6-digit verification code has been sent to
OTP_SCREEN.CHECK_SPAM: If you don't see it, you may need to check your spam folder.
OTP_SCREEN.ENTER_CODE: Please enter it below to continue.
OTP_SCREEN.WRONG_CODE: The code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
OTP_SCREEN.RESEND_ERROR: An error occurred while resending the verification code. Please try again later!

REGISTERVERIF.TEXT1: A verification Email has been sent to your address
REGISTERVERIF.TEXT2: Check your inbox to validate and complete the process

SERVER.NO_DATA: There is no data to display during the selected time frame.
SERVER.NO_DATA_WITHOUT_PERIOD: There is no data to show.
